termos-desc: These Terms and Conditions of Use govern the use of the traffic reporting application ("Application") offered by our company. By accessing or using the Application, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to any of these Terms, do not use the Application.
termos-termoum11: By using the Application, you agree to provide true, accurate, current, and complete information about yourself as prompted by the reporting form.
termos-termoum12: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of any password provided to access the Application and are fully responsible for all activities that occur under your password.
termos-termoum13: You agree not to use the Application for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
termos-termodois21: All content of the Application, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, button icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, and data compilations, is the property of our company and is protected by copyright laws and other intellectual property laws.
termos-termodois22: You agree not to reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, resell, or exploit any portion of the Application without the express written permission of our company.
termos-termotres31: The Application is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, express or implied.
termos-termotres32: Our company shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or exemplary damages resulting from the use or inability to use the Application.
termos-termoquatro41: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. The revised version of the Terms shall be effective immediately upon posting on the Application.
termos-termoquatro42: By continuing to access or use the Application after the modifications become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised Terms.
termos-termocinco51: By using the Application, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
termos-termocinco52: Our company is committed to protecting users' privacy and keeping their personal information confidential.
termos-termoseis61: Traffic reports submitted through the Application will be reviewed by the responsible team, which will take appropriate action in accordance with applicable policies and regulations.
termos-termoseis62: You acknowledge and agree that our company does not guarantee specific actions based on any report submitted through the Application.
termos-termosete71: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms or the Application, please contact us through the contact methods available on the Application. These are the complete Terms and Conditions of Use for our traffic reporting application. If you have any questions or need further clarification, please do not hesitate to contact us.
